kit.leader_skill: "Time Travelers" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +80%

super_attack.name: Furious Bites
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK; Greatly raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy; Greatly lowers ATK

ultra_super_attack.name: Spirit of Saiyans
ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises DEF; Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: Showdown with His Nemesis
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when another 3 or more Super Class allies are on the team upon the character's entry: (Once) Launches an additional Super Attack and guards all attacks for 4 turns; (Once) Ki +5 and ATK & DEF 150% up; (Once) High chance of performing a critical hit; (Once) Super Class allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 25% up; (Once) "Time Travelers" Category allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 25% up; (Forever) Damage reduction rate 30% up; When there is another Super Class ally attacking in the same turn: Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 100% up; When HP is 60% or less: ATK 60% up; Performs a critical hit; (Once) Foresees enemy's Super Attack
